text:
Kailyn Lowry is seeing someone new.

The Teen Mom 2 star opened up about her new relationship with a woman on Lindsie Chrisley‘s podcast Coffee & Convos with Lindsie Chrisley on Wednesday.

When asked by Chrisley, 27, if she has a girlfriend, Lowry, 25, said, “Yeah.”

“And have y’all been on a legitimate date?” Chrisley asked.

“I mean, yes and no,” Lowry said. “We go out to eat, but it’s kind of hard because I have kids, I have a baby.”

Lowry gave birth to her third son, Lux Russell — whom she shares with ex Chris Lopez — in August. She has two other children: Isaac Elliot, 7, with ex-boyfriend Jo Rivera, and Lincoln Marshall, 4, with ex-husband Javi Marroquin.

Despite being a busy working mother, Lowry said her relationship with her new girlfriend began as a friendship.

“We were friends for a year and so it kind of just turned into [a romantic relationship],” Lowry said. “So, it’s not like she was trying to wine and dine me to ask me to be her girlfriend, you know what I mean? It more or less just happened.”

“They say those are the best relationships,” Chrisley said.

“Well, so far so good,” Lowry said, laughing.

WATCH: Teen Mom 2’s Kailyn Lowry Shares Sweet First Family Photos Since Giving Birth to Baby Lo

While Lowry did not reveal who she is dating, it’s rumored her new girlfriend is Dominique Potter, who has frequently shared photos of the two together on Instagram.

On Wednesday, Potter shared a photo of herself and Lowry sitting side-by-side in the car, as well as a photo of the pair holding hands with the caption, “It’s all good over on this side 👀🌞.”

Image zoom Kailyn Lowry and Dominique Potter

Image zoom Dominique Potter and Kailyn Lowry Dominique Potter/Instagram

Do I have to be gay or straight? Can't I just love people? — Kail Lowry (@KailLowry) June 7, 2016

In June 2016, Lowry posted a cryptic tweet, writing, “Do I have to be gay or straight? Can’t I just love people?”

Her ex-husband, Marroquin, told PEOPLE in October that he was dating Lowry’s Teen Mom 2 costar Briana DeJesus.
title: Teen Mom 2's Kailyn Lowry Reveals She Has a Girlfriend
